backup that file like this "cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf.orig", then change the line marked #108 at pastebin to include only resolution "1024x768". Remove the rest.
if this doesn't work, then copying the old file back (ie "cp /etc/X11/xorg.conf.orig /etc/X11/xorg.conf") will get you back to the same state you are in.
